lead_paragraph: A hat-trick by Salomon Kalou gave Hertha Berlin a 3-0 victory over Borussia Moenchengladbach on Friday to lift them to third in the Bundesliga and leave their opponents without a win in five games.

headline.print_headline: Kalou Hat-Trick Sends Hertha Back Into Top Three
headline.main: Kalou Hat-Trick Sends Hertha Back Into Top Three

snippet: A hat-trick by Salomon Kalou gave Hertha Berlin a 3-0 victory over Borussia Moenchengladbach on Friday to lift them to third in the Bundesliga and leave their opponents without a win in five games....
